sentences.en: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.cn: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.en: As soon as relations improve they will be allowed to go.
sentences.cn: 一旦关系有所改善，他们就可以获准离开。

sentences.en: Better driv-ing equipment will improve track adhesion in slippery conditions.
sentences.cn: 较好的驾驶设备能够提升在湿滑路面上的抓地力。

sentences.en: Exercising the body does a great deal to improve one's health.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体对增进健康大有益处。

sentences.en: He said he was going to improve his football.
sentences.cn: 他说他要提高足球技术。

sentences.en: How can faculty improve their teaching so as to encourage creativity?
sentences.cn: 教师们如何才能改进教学以激发创造性呢？

sentences.en: It doesn't take much to improve the energy efficiency of your home.
sentences.cn: 改善家庭能耗并非难事。

sentences.en: Lights clipped onto life jackets improve the chances of rescue.
sentences.cn: 别在救生衣上的灯提高了获救可能性。

sentences.en: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.cn: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

sentences.en: Massage is used to relax muscles, relieve stress and improve the circulation.
sentences.cn: 按摩可以使肌肉放松，缓解压力和促进血液循环。

sentences.en: No amount of tinkering is going to improve matters.
sentences.cn: 任何小修小补都是于事无补的。

sentences.en: Opportunities will improve as the company expands domestically and internationally.
sentences.cn: 随着国内业务和国际业务的扩展，该公司将获得更好的机会。

sentences.en: People have been waiting impatiently for a chance to improve the situation.
sentences.cn: 人们一直在焦急地等待使形势出现转机的机会。

sentences.en: Strenuous efforts had been made to improve conditions in the jail.
sentences.cn: 已经做了大量的努力来改善监狱的条件。

sentences.en: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
The tobacco industry has been trying to improve its image.
sentences.cn: 烟草行业一直在试图改善其形象。

sentences.en: This will improve your performance and help you burn off calories.
sentences.cn: 这将会改善你的表现，并帮你消耗卡路里。

sentences.en: We need to improve on our performance against France.
sentences.cn: 我们需要比对阵法国队时表现得更好。

sentences.en: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.cn: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。
